statements: SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio;
SELECT customer_id, portfolio_name, current_value FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio;
SELECT customer_id, initial_investment, last_rebalance_date FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_tolerance, current_value FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio;
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high';
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT portfolio_name, current_value FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(current_value) AS total_value FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_value > 50000;
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio WHERE last_rebalance_date >= '2022-01-01' OR risk_tolerance = 'Medium' ORDER BY last_rebalance_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(current_value) AS avg_value, MAX(current_value) AS max_value, MIN(current_value) AS min_value FROM RoboAdvisorPortfolio WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Portfolios;
SELECT customer_id, portfolio_name FROM Customer_Portfolios WHERE total_assets > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Portfolios ORDER BY risk_level DESC, total_assets ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_assets FROM Customer_Portfolios WHERE total_assets < 10000 AND risk_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM Rebalance_Criteria WHERE frequency = 'Monthly' ORDER BY threshold ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Portfolios ORDER BY total_assets DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, portfolio_name FROM Customer_Portfolios WHERE total_assets > 100000 ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT MAX(total_assets) AS max_assets, MIN(total_assets) AS min_assets FROM Customer_Portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_assets FROM Customer_Portfolios WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM Rebalance_Criteria WHERE threshold >= 10 ORDER BY criteria_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT criteria_name FROM Criteria WHERE criteria_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT portfolio_id, balance, assets FROM Portfolio WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM Portfolio WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT criteria_name, criteria_description FROM Criteria;
SELECT * FROM Customer JOIN Portfolio ON Customer.customer_id = Portfolio.customer_id WHERE balance < 5000;
SELECT customer_name, assets FROM Customer JOIN Portfolio ON Customer.customer_id = Portfolio.customer_id ORDER BY assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, quantity FROM PortfolioAssets WHERE asset_type='Stock';
SELECT criteria_name, threshold FROM RebalanceCriteria WHERE threshold > 1000 ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM RebalancingLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM PortfolioAssets WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT criteria_name, threshold FROM RebalanceCriteria ORDER BY threshold DESC;
SELECT asset_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM RebalancingLogs WHERE criteria_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN PortfolioAssets ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = PortfolioAssets.customer_id WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Portfolios;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM Assets;
SELECT criteria_name, rebalance_threshold FROM Criteria;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Portfolios WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT criteria_name, rebalance_threshold FROM Criteria ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM RebalancingHistory WHERE portfolio_id = 2 AND TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01';
